info.title: Trade News & Articles API
info.description: The Trade News & Articles API provides in-depth news and articles written by Trade Specialists working in the Federal government. The authors include staff from ITA as well as other Trade Promotion Coordinating Committee (TPCC) agencies.

get.description: The Trade News & Articles API provides in-depth news and articles written by Trade Specialists working in the Federal government. The authors include staff from ITA as well as other Trade Promotion Coordinating Committee (TPCC) agencies.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Searches for a match within the title, short_title, summary, content, and keyword fields.

parameters.name: export_phases
parameters.description: Returns articles based on the export phase. Enter multiple terms by separating with a comma.

parameters.name: industries
parameters.description: Returns articles for a specific controlled industry terms. This method allows you to search for multiple industries separated by commas.

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: Returns office locations based on ISO alpha-2 country codes.

parameters.name: topics
parameters.description: Returns articles based on topic. Enter multiple terms by separating with a comma.

parameters.name: sub_topics
parameters.description: Returns articles based on sub-topic. Enter multiple terms by separating with a comma.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size parameter allows you to configure the maximum amount of hits to be returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset parameter defines the offset from the first result you want to fetch.

short_title.description: A shortened title for the article.

summary.description: A summary of the article's content.

creation_date.description: The date of the article's creation.

release_date.description: The date of the article's release.

expiration_date.description: The date of the article's expiration.

source_business_units.description: The business units for each source agency.

source_offices.description: The offices for each source business unit.

evergreen.description: Flag to designate “timeless” articles, always topically relevant.

keyword.description: A list of keywords for the article assigned by the author.

export_phases.description: The export phases assigned to the article.

industries.description: The industries assigned to the article.

countries.description: The countries associated with the article

topics.description: The topics assigned to the article.

sub_topics.description: The sub-topics assigned to the article for each topic.

geo_regions.description: The world regions covered by the article's content.

geo_subregions.description: The world sub-regions associated with the article for each geo region.

trade_regions.description: The trade regions covered by the article's content.

trade_programs.description: The trade programs covered by the article's content.

trade_initiatives.description: The trade initiatives covered by the article's content.

file_url.description: The URLs for files included in the article.

image_url.description: The URLs for images included in the article.

url_html_source.description: The URL for the HTML of the article's source.

url_xml_source.description: The URL for the XML of the article's source.
